entry.title: Paris Tack Three Sided Premium Slow Feeder Hay Bag with Super Tough Bottom and 6 Month Warranty
entry.summary:
Vendor: Paris Tack
Type: Hay Bags
Price: 34.99

Paris Tack’s line of slow feed hay bags has been meticulously designed, tested, and improved over the past 15 years in order to give you a product superior to anything else available on the market. Our unique web front hay bags are designed with cross stitches at every intersection and bartack stitching at all stress points along the top, sides, and bottom of the bag. This hay bag also features our exclusive Super Tough Bottom®: a grid of reinforced nylon webbing that will never rip like solid or mesh bottoms. Our bags are built tough from premium materials and are designed to last for years to come. This hay bag is designed to be a great everyday feeder for most horses and other animals: it measures 22x10x28" and can hold about 2-3 flakes of hay. This hay bag has 3x2” rectangular front openings which will prevent hay wastage and slow down their rate of consumption, but still allow for frustration-free feeding. This premium hay bag also includes a 6-month limited manufacturer's warranty offered by Derby Originals.

  • HOLDS 2-3 FLAKES OF HAY - this 22x10x28" hay bag with 3x2” rectangular openings holds approx. 2-3 flakes of Timothy, Orchard, Alfalfa, or any other type of hay. Our hay bags were designed to minimize frustration and can be stuffed in seconds.
  • SUPER TOUGH BOTTOM® DESIGN - our exclusive Super Tough Bottom® is made of reinforced overlapping nylon webbing. This design allows for superior strength and durability while keeping your hay fresh and allowing dust and debris to exit the bag.
  • DURABLE LASTING CONSTRUCTION - our heavy-duty reinforced nylon hay bag has replaceable hanging straps and snaps. This allows you to easily replace worn parts, extending the life of the bag. Many customers say their hay bag has lasted 3+ years!
  • IMPROVES DIGESTION - horses are designed to spend up to 18 hours a day grazing. Slow feeding allows you to replicate this natural behavior and is recommended by veterinarians to prevent gastric ulcers, colic, and boredom-related behavioral vices.
  • SIX MONTH WARRANTY - this hay bag has a 6-month limited manufacturer's warranty offered by Derby Originals. This warranty covers manufacturing defects. Accidental damage or wear and tear is not covered. Contact the manufacturer for more information.

entry.title: Paris Tack Large Supreme Slow Feeder Horse Hay Bag with Super Tough Bottom and 1 Year Warranty
entry.summary:
Vendor: Paris Tack
Type: Hay Bags
Price: 64.99

Derby Originals is the original inventor of the 4-sided hay bag, U.S. Patent No. D742,078. Our four-sided hay bags are the only bags on the market that allow your horse to freely eat from any part of the hay bag. These patented hay bags are the result of years of careful study and testing to create a design that is attractive, functional, durable, high-quality, and preferred by horses. Our bags are constructed of reinforced nylon webbing that is stronger and more durable than any mesh or fabric hay bag. These bags are designed with cross stitches at every intersection and bartack stitching at all stress points along the top, sides, and bottom of the bag. This hay bag also features our exclusive Super Tough Bottom®: a grid of reinforced nylon webbing that will never rip like solid or mesh bottoms. Our bags are built tough from premium materials and are designed to last for years to come. This hay bag is designed to be a great everyday feeder for most horses and other animals: it measures 32x12x24" and can hold 1 bale of hay. This hay bag has 1.75” square openings which will prevent hay wastage and slow down their rate of consumption, but still allow for frustration-free feeding. This premium hay bag also includes a 1-year limited manufacturer's warranty offered by Derby Originals.

  • HOLDS 1 BALE OF HAY - this 32x12x24" hay bag with 1.75” square openings can hold 1 bale of Timothy, Orchard, Alfalfa, or any other type of hay. Our hay bags were designed to minimize frustration and can be stuffed in seconds.
  • EXCLUSIVE PATENTED 4-SIDED CONSTRUCTION - this hay bag features Derby Originals patented nylon web design that allows your horse to eat from any part of the hay bag. This design eliminates the risk of material rips and tears found in other hay bags.
  • SUPER TOUGH BOTTOM® DESIGN - our exclusive Super Tough Bottom® is made of reinforced overlapping nylon webbing. This design allows for superior strength and durability while keeping your hay fresh and allowing dust and debris to exit the bag.
  • IMPROVES DIGESTION - horses are designed to spend up to 18 hours a day grazing. Slow feeding allows you to replicate this natural behavior and is recommended by veterinarians to prevent gastric ulcers, colic, and boredom-related behavioral vices.
  • ONE YEAR WARRANTY - this hay bag has a 1-year limited manufacturer's warranty offered by Derby Originals. This warranty covers manufacturing defects. Accidental damage or wear and tear is not covered. Contact the manufacturer for more information.

entry.title: Derby Originals 48” Superior Slow Feed Soft Mesh Hanging Hay Net for Horses
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Hay Nets
Price: 13.95

     

    Derby Originals Superior Slow Feed Soft Mesh Hanging Hay Nets for Horses offer a superior slow feeding option to traditional hay nets. Unlike standard hay nets, which are made of brittle and easily fraying and breaking poly rope, our hay nets are made from soft mesh rope that has an incredibly high breaking strength, is long-lasting, and is UV, mold, and mildew resistant. Our slow feed hay nets have been carefully designed to be comfortable for your horse to use and eat from and are more gentle on their teeth and gums than traditional hay nets or other feeders. Our hay nets are available in a wide array of sizes and colors so that you can find the perfect net for you and your horse!


    Please be aware that all Derby Originals soft mesh hay nets are made by hand, and may have slight variation in overall size and the size of the openings. All measurements and capacities listed are approximate. The amount of hay that our hay nets can hold varies greatly due to the type of hay being fed, the dimensions of the hay bale, and the size of the hay flake.

     

    • PREVENTS EXCESS HAY WASTAGE - our slow feed hay nets are designed to help you save money and reduce waste by over 50%. These hay nets prevent hay from being scattered or soiled which is beneficial to your horse's health as well as your wallet.
    • IMPROVES YOUR HORSE'S DIGESTION - hay nets allow you to slow feed your horse, which mimics natural grazing patterns and is proven to aid the digestive process. Slow feeding is recommended by veterinarians to prevent gastric ulcers and colic.
    • REDUCES BOREDOM - horses are designed to spend up to 16 hours a day grazing. Slow feeding replicates this natural behavior and keeps your horse occupied longer, which helps to prevent boredom-based bad behaviors such as chewing, cribbing, and pacing.
    • EXCLUSIVE SOFT MESH DESIGN - our slow feed hay nets are made from a soft but durable poly rope that is better for your horse's teeth and gum health and more comfortable to eat from than hard metal feeders and traditional hay nets.
    • HOLDS APPROX. 5-7 FLAKES - this slow feed hay net can hold about 5-7 flakes or up to a half of a 2-string or square bale of hay. These hay nets are great for everyday feeding and can be used in stalls, trailers, and pastures.

entry.title: Replacement Adjustable Nylon Strap with Replaceable Snap for Slow Feed Hay Bags - Pair
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Hay Bag Accessories
Price: 4.95

It's frustrating whenever you lose one of the straps to your slow feed hay bag. These replacement straps can make your hay bag complete again!

  •  Size: Adjustable 21" - 36" end to end
  •  Fits many hay bag styles
  •  Available as a pair
  •  Includes heavy duty replaceable snap

entry.title: Derby Originals Nylon Hay Bag with Mesh Ventilation Windows and Ties on Top with Six Month Warranty
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tack Wholesale
Type: Hay Bags
Price: 22.95

FEATURES NEW MESH VENTILATION WINDOWS - this hay bag features a mesh ventilation window on both side gussets to promote airflow, prevent moisture buildup, and allow dust to exit the hay while also preventing pests from getting into your hay.

STURDY LIGHTWEIGHT CONSTRUCTION – these hay bags are made of durable nylon material with reinforced stitching at every seam and are designed to be used both indoors or outdoors.

NEW TOP-CLOSURE DESIGN - unlike regular hay bags that have an open top that cannot be closed, our hay bag features a tie on either side that allows you to close up the top of the bag to prevent horses from pulling excess hay out.

EASY TO HANG – this hay bag features a pair of d-rings at the top which allows these hay bags to easily be hung using rope or snaps, hung in a stall or from a fence, inside a trailer, or whichever way you prefer!

GENEROUS SIZING – these hay bags are generously sized and perfect for use in the stall, trailer, at pasture, or at a show due to their large sizing at 19" L x 19" H x 12" W.

entry.title: Derby Originals 42" Economy 1" Slow Feed Hay Net for Mini Horses and Livestock Holds 1-2 Flakes of Hay
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Hay Nets
Price: 7.95

This hay net is designed for use with smaller horses and livestock and is designed to only hold 1-2 flakes of hay. This hay net is made from thinner 1mm material and is not designed for use with full-sized horses or larger livestock, as they may damage the hay nets during use.

 

Product Features

ECONOMY POLY ROPE DESIGN - this hay net is made of an economy poly rope material that is 1mm in thickness and designed for use with smaller horses and livestock such as miniature horses and ponies, goats, sheep, and more.

HOLDS 1-2 FLAKES - this 42” ultra-slow feed hay net will hold approx. 1-2 flakes of hay, depending on the hay type and flake size, and how dense the hay is packed. These nets are ideal for use in the trailer or for single feedings.

PERFECT FOR LIVESTOCK - this hay net has a smaller 1x1” opening size that is ideal for smaller livestock animals such as sheep, goats, and miniature horses who may eat too fast from or get hooves caught in larger hay nets.

FEED YOUR HORSE MORE NATURALLY - this hay net makes your animal eat slower, which mimics natural grazing and is proven to reduce colic, lower the risk of stomach ulcers, and prevent boredom and destructive behaviors.

AVAILABLE IN FIVE FUN COLORS - these hay nets are available in five colors to best suit you and your animal's needs: Royal Blue, Black, Lime Green, Purple, and Red.

entry.title: Derby Originals 1200D Breathable Hay Bale Bags with Mesh Ventilation Flaps for Storage and Transport
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Bale Bags
Price: 34.95 - 59.95 (8 variants)

Derby Originals 1200D Breathable Hay Bale Bags with Mesh Ventilation Flaps have revolutionized the bale bag market. Traditional bale bags are fully enclosed and can cause the hay to rot and become sour-smelling, which is potentially harmful to your animals. Our revolutionary design features 4 mesh ventilation windows around the bag to combat this problem. These vents are made of a reinforced mesh that is covered in a 1200D nylon flap. This covering still allows fresh air to enter the bag while protecting the hay inside from the rain. This exclusive design also prevents anything from entering your hay bag and spoiling your hay. This, combined with our ultra-tough 1200D nylon shell, reinforced seams, and durable zipper and carry straps results in a bale bag that is built horse tough and designed to last.


  • IMPROVED VENTILATION FOR OPTIMUM HAY FRESHNESS - our exclusive mesh ventilation window design keeps your hay cleaner, drier, and fresher than traditional bale bags. These bags have 4 total vent flaps: 2 on the front of the bag, and 1 on each side.
  • ULTRA-DURABLE 1200D DESIGN - unlike other flimsy bale bags, ours is made of premium 1200D nylon fabric with reinforced seams and straps. Our bale bag is 2-3x tougher than your average bag, which is why we back them with a 1-year manufacturer's warranty.
  • MAKES HAY STORAGE AND TRANSPORT EASY - our mess-free bale bags make hauling hay to events, shows, or around the farm easier than ever! Adding hay into our bags is a breeze with our wraparound zipper, and our attached carry straps make transport easy.
  • GREAT FOR INDOOR OR OUTDOOR USE - indoors, our self-contained design helps minimize messes. Outdoors, our waterproof fabric keeps your hay dry while our ventilation flaps still allow fresh air to circulate inside the bale bag.
  • AVAILABLE IN 2-STRING AND 3-STRING SIZES - these bale bags are available in 2 sizes: Large, measuring 44” L x 16” H x 20” W, and X-Large, measuring 52” L x 20” H x 28” W. Size Large fits 2-string square bales, and X-Large fits 3-string California bales.

entry.title: Derby Originals Waterproof Rolling Hay Bale Bag with One Year Warranty and Easy Carry Handles
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Bale Bags
Price: 69.95

Derby Originals’ line of hay and bale bags and hay nets have been individually tailored to meet the needs of horses and other equines (donkeys, mules, etc.), and livestock such as sheep and goats, cattle, alpacas and llamas, and even small mammals such as rabbits and guinea pigs.

  • TRULY HEAVY DUTY CONSTRUCTION - this bale bag is made of heavy-duty, reinforced, and waterproof nylon for a durable design that will last for years! This bag also includes eight reinforced handles, five sturdy wheels, and a heavy-duty wrap around zipper.
  • WATERPROOF - this bale bag is completely waterproof so that you can store your hay without worrying about water damage causing your hay to become rotted or moldy, unlike many other brand’s hay bags.
  • HEAVY DUTY WHEELS FOR EASY TRANSPORT - this hay bag comes with five plastic rolling wheels so you can easily transport your hay around the stable or a show, or wherever you need to make hay!
  • VENTILATED FOR FRESHNESS - these bale bags have six built-in ventilation holes to allow for fresh air to enter the bag and keep your bale fresh and dry.
  • GENEROUS SIZING - these rolling bale bags are sized to comfortably accommodate large two-string bales thanks to their 44” x 18” x 15” design.

entry.title: Derby Originals 42” Classic Slow Feed Hanging Hay Net for Horses
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Hay Nets
Price: 7.95

Product Description and Bullet Points:

Derby Originals 42” Classic Slow Feed Hanging Hay Net for Horses are the perfect everyday slow feeding option for your horses. These sturdy hay nets are made from a durable poly rope that is long-lasting and is UV, mold, and mildew resistant. Our slow feed hay nets have been carefully designed to be comfortable for your horse to use and are great for daily individual and group feeding, use while trailering, and for soaking hay. Our hay nets are available in a wide array of colors so that you can find the perfect net for you and your horse!


Please be aware that all Derby Originals slow feed hay nets are made by hand, and may have slight variation in overall size and the size of the openings. All measurements and capacities listed are approximate. The amount of hay that our hay nets can hold varies greatly due to the type of hay being fed, the dimensions of the hay bale, and the size of the hay flake.


PREVENTS EXCESS HAY WASTAGE - our slow feed hay nets are designed to help you save money and reduce waste by over 50%. These hay nets prevent hay from being scattered or soiled which is beneficial to your horse's health as well as your wallet.

IMPROVES YOUR HORSE'S DIGESTION - hay nets allow you to slow feed your horse, which mimics natural grazing patterns and is proven to aid the digestive process. Slow feeding is recommended by veterinarians to prevent gastric ulcers and colic.

REDUCES BOREDOM - horses are designed to spend up to 16 hours a day grazing. Slow feeding replicates this natural behavior and keeps your horse occupied longer, which helps to prevent boredom-based bad behaviors such as chewing, cribbing, and pacing.

DURABLE MULTI-PURPOSE DESIGN - our hay nets are made from a mold, mildew, and UV resistant poly rope that is resistant to breaking and tearing, making these nets ideal for daily individual and group feeding, use while trailering, and for soaking hay.

HOLDS APPROX. 4-6 FLAKES - this slow feed hay net can hold about 4-6 flakes or up to a half of a 2-string or square bale of hay. These hay nets are great for everyday feeding and can be used in stalls, trailers, and pastures.

entry.title: Weaver Leather Slow Feed Hay Net
entry.summary:
Vendor: Weaver Leather
Type: Hay Nets
Price: 12.99

Designed with smaller size holes for slower feeding and better digestion, these 36" rope hay nets are perfect for holding hay at shows.

entry.title: Derby Originals Ventilated 600D Nylon Full Hay Bale Bag with 1 Year Warranty and Carry Straps
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Bale Bags
Price: 39.95

This high-quality hay bale carrier holds one full-size bale of three-string or California size hay. This hay bag is constructed of heavy duty poly/nylon with two ventilation holes on each side of the bag, making eight in total, to promote airflow and keep your hay dry and fresh. The full wrap-around zipper on three sides and durable carry straps with cross-stitch fastening make this bag easy to use and transport.

Product Features

  • GENEROUSLY SIZED — this bale bag is the largest on the market and measures in at 52" X 28" X 20", which provides plenty of room for most three string bales, even fitting up to a bale and a half!
  • HEAVY DUTY CONSTRUCTION — our bale bags are made with a heavy-duty poly and nylon construction, with durable carry straps with cross-stitched fastening, and a three-sided, heavy-duty, full wraparound zipper.
  • WELL VENTILATED — these bale bags have a pair of grommets on the ends and 4 in the front (eight total) to let fresh air in and prevent moisture buildup. Unlike with other brand’s bags, your hay won’t mold in this bag.
  • MULTIPLE COLORS AVAILABLE — these hay bale bags are available in three attractive colors: Black/Silver, Red/Black, and Royal Blue/Turquoise.
  • NOT JUST FOR HORSES — these bale bags are great for storing hay or straw for donkeys/mules, chickens, rabbits, cattle, sheep and goats, alpacas, llamas, and other livestock, or exotic pets like tortoises.

entry.title: Derby Originals Scratchless Slow Feed Horse Hay Bag with Super Tough Bottom and Six Month Warranty
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Hay Bags
Price: 29.95

If you’re looking for a high-quality, stunning hay bag for your barn, pasture, or trailer, this new Derby Originals Drawstring Scratchless No Hardware Top Load Horse Hay Bag with New Super-Tough Bottom is the perfect choice. This hay bag is made with the same premium features as our other top loading hay bags, including a sturdy high-quality velcro closure, reinforced stitching, and a heavy duty nylon construction, but features an innovative new hardware free design that makes this a safe option for use in trailers. This hay bag has a large capacity when compared to other scratchless designs and measures 24.5" x 9.5" x 21.5" in size with 3.5” square front openings. This hay bag can comfortably hold around 3-5 flakes of hay.

EASY HANG DRAWSTRING TOP - this hay bag features a sturdy drawstring rope for easy and adjustable hanging in the stall, trailer, or in the pasture. This hay bag also features a bottom stabilizing strap to prevent your horse from tossing the hay bag or twisting it.

HOLDS 3-5 FLAKES - these 24.5x9.5x21.5” large hay bag will hold approx. 3-5 flakes of hay, depending on the hay type and flake size, and how dense the hay is packed. These bags are rated to last the average horse about 30 hours or more.

NO HARDWARE DESIGN - this hay bag features a high-quality hardware free construction that was designed to maximize safety, and prevent scratching and damage to your trailer or stall wall.

PERFECT FOR THE TRAILER - this easy to hang hay bag was designed with trailer use in mind and features a no-scratch drawstring top, and a bottom reinforcement strap that allows you to properly secure the bag to your trailer.

DESIGNED FOR HORSES AND OTHER LIVESTOCK - this hay bag features 3.5” square openings that are designed to allow horses of all sizes and livestock animals such as sheep,  goats, and cattle to freely eat.

entry.title: Derby Originals XL Super Tough Slow Feed Hay Bag with 1 Year Warranty and Patented Four Sided Design
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Hay Bags
Price: 84.95

Derby Originals Patented Four Sided Hay Bags are Designed with Your Horse’s Comfort in Mind. Our hay bags are the only hay bags on the market that allow your horse to eat freely from any side of the hay bag. Derby Originals holds the patent, U.S. Patent No. D742,078., for this innovative feature. Our brand is the world’s only brand with a completely open four-sided design that allows for optimum ease of feeding, air flow, preventing hay rot, and allowing for easy in-bag soaking. We are also proud to be the first company to offer a one year warranty on hay bags. Our patented hay bags are the result of years of careful study and testing with horses to create a design that is attractive, functional, durable, high-quality, and preferred by horses. Our hay bags are made of a strong 1200D double-layered nylon that is UV resistant, can withstand high temperatures, is mildew-resistant, and dries quickly. With a large line of size options, opening size options, colors, and styles, we have a patented hay bag designed to suit every horse!

EXCLUSIVE PATENTED DESIGN - our patented four-sided design allows your horse to comfortably eat from any part of this hay bag while also offering superior airflow and allowing dust and debris to exit the hay without creating excess waste.

HELPS TO SUPPORT GOOD DIGESTION - our hay bags replicate natural and healthy grazing patterns by slowing down your horse’s rate of hay consumption to both decrease hay waste and help prevent digestion issues such as potentially deadly colic.

HEAVY-DUTY CONSTRUCTION - our hay bag is made of super tough double-layered 1200D nylon and features premium hardware and straps and reinforced stitching that allows it to withstand whatever forces your horse exerts on it.

THE IDEAL SLOW FEEDER - this 46x26x12” hay bag features uniform 2” square openings which allow your horse to eat comfortably at a more natural pace that mimics grazing. Our hay bags are ideal for helping to prevent colic or digestive upset.

ONE YEAR LIMITED MANUFACTURER’S WARRANTY - this product comes with a one-year limited manufacturer's warranty that protects against manufacturing and quality defects. This warranty does not cover accidental damage.

REDUCES BOREDOM - horses are designed to spend up to 16 hours a day grazing. Slow feeding replicates this natural behavior and keeps your horse occupied longer, which helps to prevent boredom-based bad behaviors such as chewing, cribbing, and pacing.

DURABLE MULTI-PURPOSE DESIGN - our hay nets are made from a mold, mildew, and UV resistant poly rope that is resistant to breaking and tearing, making these nets ideal for daily individual and group feeding, use while trailering, and for soaking hay.

HOLDS APPROX. 4-6 FLAKES - this slow feed hay net can hold about 4-6 flakes or up to a half of a 2-string or square bale of hay. These hay nets are great for everyday feeding and can be used in stalls, trailers, and pastures.

entry.title: Derby Originals XL Supreme Slow Feed Hay Bag with 1 Year Warranty and Patented Four Sided Design
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Hay Bags
Price: 84.95

Derby Originals Patented Four Sided Hay Bags are Designed with Your Horse’s Comfort in Mind. Our hay bags are the only hay bags on the market that allow your horse to eat freely from any side of the hay bag. Derby Originals holds the patent, U.S. Patent No. D742,078., for this innovative feature. Our brand is the world’s only brand with a completely open four-sided design that allows for optimum ease of feeding, air flow, preventing hay rot, and allowing for easy in-bag soaking. We are also proud to be the first company to offer a one year warranty on hay bags. Our patented hay bags are the result of years of careful study and testing with horses to create a design that is attractive, functional, durable, high-quality, and preferred by horses. Our hay bags are made of a strong 1200D double-layered nylon that is UV resistant, can withstand high temperatures, is mildew-resistant, and dries quickly. With a large line of size options, opening size options, colors, and styles, we have a patented hay bag designed to suit every horse!

EXCLUSIVE PATENTED DESIGN - our patented four-sided design allows your horse to comfortably eat from any part of this hay bag while also offering superior airflow and allowing dust and debris to exit the hay without creating excess waste.

HELPS TO SUPPORT GOOD DIGESTION - our hay bags replicate natural and healthy grazing patterns by slowing down your horse’s rate of hay consumption to both decrease hay waste and help prevent digestion issues such as potentially deadly colic.

HEAVY-DUTY CONSTRUCTION - our hay bag is made of super tough double-layered 1200D nylon and features premium hardware and straps and reinforced stitching that allows it to withstand whatever forces your horse exerts on it.

THE IDEAL SLOW FEEDER - this 44x25x12” hay bag features 1.75” by 3.5” rectangular openings which allow your horse to eat comfortably at a more natural pace that mimics grazing. Our hay bags are ideal for helping to prevent colic or digestive upset.

ONE YEAR LIMITED MANUFACTURER’S WARRANTY - this product comes with a one-year limited manufacturer's warranty that protects against manufacturing and quality defects. This warranty does not cover accidental damage.

  • Unique reflective trim around opening for added safety & visibility

entry.title: Derby Originals XL Go Around Slow Feeder Horse Hay Bag with Super Tough Bottom and 1 Year Warranty
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Hay Bags
Price: 89.99

 

Derby Originals is the original inventor of the 4-sided hay bag, U.S. Patent No. D742,078. Our four-sided hay bags are the only bags on the market that allow your horse to freely eat from any part of the hay bag. These patented hay bags are the result of years of careful study and testing to create a design that is attractive, functional, durable, high-quality, and preferred by horses. Our bags are constructed of reinforced nylon webbing that is stronger and more durable than any mesh or fabric hay bag. These bags are designed with cross stitches at every intersection and bartack stitching at all stress points along the top, sides, and bottom of the bag. This hay bag also features our exclusive Super Tough Bottom®: a grid of reinforced nylon webbing that will never rip like solid or mesh bottoms. Our bags are built tough from premium materials and are designed to last for years to come. This hay bag is designed to be a great everyday feeder for most horses and other animals: it measures 19x19x41" and can hold 1 bale of hay. This hay bag has 1.75” square openings which will prevent hay wastage and slow down their rate of consumption, but still allow for frustration-free feeding. This premium hay bag also includes a 1-year limited manufacturer's warranty offered by Derby Originals.

  • HOLDS 1 BALE OF HAY - this 19x19x41" hay bag with 1.75" square openings holds approx. 1 bale of Timothy, Orchard, Alfalfa, or any other type of hay. Our hay bags were designed to minimize frustration and can be stuffed in seconds.
  • EXCLUSIVE PATENTED 4-SIDED CONSTRUCTION - this hay bag features Derby Originals patented nylon web design that allows your horse to eat from any part of the hay bag. This design eliminates the risk of material rips and tears found in other hay bags.
  • SUPER TOUGH BOTTOM® DESIGN - our exclusive Super Tough Bottom® is made of reinforced overlapping nylon webbing. This design allows for superior strength and durability while keeping your hay fresh and allowing dust and debris to exit the bag.
  • IMPROVES DIGESTION - horses are designed to spend up to 18 hours a day grazing. Slow feeding allows you to replicate this natural behavior and is recommended by veterinarians to prevent gastric ulcers, colic, and boredom-related behavioral vices.
  • ONE YEAR WARRANTY - this hay bag has a 1-year limited manufacturer's warranty offered by Derby Originals. This warranty covers manufacturing defects. Accidental damage or wear and tear is not covered. Contact the manufacturer for more information.

entry.title: Derby Originals 56” Ultra Slow Feed Hanging Hay Net for Horses
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Hay Nets
Price: 17.95

Product Description and Bullet Points:

Derby Originals 56” Ultra Slow Feed Hanging Hay Net for Horses are the perfect everyday slow feeding option for your horses. These sturdy hay nets are made from a durable poly rope that is long-lasting and is UV, mold, and mildew resistant. Our slow feed hay nets have been carefully designed to be comfortable for your horse to use and are great for daily individual and group feeding, use while trailering, and for soaking hay. Our hay nets are available in a wide array of sizes and colors so that you can find the perfect net for you and your horse!


Please be aware that all Derby Originals slow feed hay nets are made by hand, and may have slight variation in overall size and the size of the openings. All measurements and capacities listed are approximate. The amount of hay that our hay nets can hold varies greatly due to the type of hay being fed, the dimensions of the hay bale, and the size of the hay flake.


PREVENTS EXCESS HAY WASTAGE - our slow feed hay nets are designed to help you save money and reduce waste by over 50%. These hay nets prevent hay from being scattered or soiled which is beneficial to your horse's health as well as your wallet.

IMPROVES YOUR HORSE'S DIGESTION - hay nets allow you to slow feed your horse, which mimics natural grazing patterns and is proven to aid the digestive process. Slow feeding is recommended by veterinarians to prevent gastric ulcers and colic.

REDUCES BOREDOM - horses are designed to spend up to 16 hours a day grazing. Slow feeding replicates this natural behavior and keeps your horse occupied longer, which helps to prevent boredom-based bad behaviors such as chewing, cribbing, and pacing.

DURABLE MULTI-PURPOSE DESIGN - our hay nets are made from a mold, mildew, and UV resistant poly rope that is resistant to breaking and tearing, making these nets ideal for daily individual and group feeding, use while trailering, and for soaking hay.

HOLDS APPROX. 8-12 FLAKES - this slow feed hay net can hold about 8-12 flakes or up to a full 2-string or square bale of hay. These hay nets are great for everyday feeding and can be used in stalls, trailers, and pastures.

entry.title: Derby Originals Slow Feed Hay Box Covers Available in Three Opening Sizes
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Hay Bag Accessories
Price: 44.95

This slow feed cover is for hay boxes. The cover has smaller openings to limit the rate that the horse consumes the hay. It has a metal frame to help the cover keep its shape. Most hay boxes come with a metal grid that can get hot in the summer and horses can accidentally hurt their teeth and gums on it. The cover made by Derby Originals is made from a durable nylon material that will not hurt your horse while eating.

  • THREE OPENING SIZES – these hay box covers are available in 1.75×1.75”, 2×2”, and 1.75×3.5” hole styles to suit your needs and your horse’s feeding preferences.
  • HEAVY-DUTY CONSTRUCTION – with a strong metal frame and heavy-duty stitching on the double-ply nylon, this design is built to last and stand up to years of wear and tear from your horses.
  • STEEL FRAME SIZING – the cold-rolled steel frames measure 32" × 22.5”, which is large enough for most hay boxes and will allow for your horse to have plenty of hay.
  • A SAFER ALTERNATIVE – these hay box covers are made with a heavy-duty 1” wide double-ply nylon mesh. Regular metal hay box grates can cause severe tooth and gum damage over time, but with nylon, your horse’s mouth won’t get irritated or cut as they eat.
  • PERFECT FOR DIY PROJECTS – if you’re making your horse a DIY hay box, these grates are perfect to use because of their safe nylon design, the ability to use multiple grates for larger feeders, and the ability to mix and match or swap out opening sizes.
